title: What if instead of making graves when Yorick killed a unit with his Q he made Graves?

This is just too good!
This should be used on this upcoming April fools. Make it happen riot
Riot is too chicken to do something this bold
It could be an event game mode
an army of tiny Graves shooting at you would be funny and scary at same time
Did you know, when Zyra was in the preliminary production phase, they used minion Sion and Morgana models as her melee / ranged plants?
When he summons the maiden they all cast Collateral Damage in the direction of the nearest enemy.

-Echoing among all the Graves -
_**"They picked the wrong fight."**_
An army of tiny little Graves hunting down Graves, who made a grave mistake, to send him to an early grave.
New rotating game mode: 'It's Graves news'
for every point in his ult the graves(s) get an additional duskblade
Anyone else read that the other way to start with and get confused?
I'm against this his Q is his main damage source, tho mini graves would be a badass mechanic, faker would be toast
